properties.description: Private IT services and consulting firm in Saudi Arabia with 105 employees and 8.8% YoY growth; specializes in digital transformation, IoT connectivity, manufacturing execution systems, and SaaS platforms like O3OZONE and MADAR, which are cloud-based and listed on Microsoft Marketplace.
properties.content:
## About usFind Out How We Started

The embrace of smart technology has radically enhanced productivity and agility across Obeikan’s business units. Since beginning our digitalization drive, we’ve improved our productivity and quality control and reduced costs. And most importantly, we’ve escalated our competitiveness and ability to innovate.

Before, we were order-takers. Today we’re productivity-makers, helping other manufacturers achieve similar game-changing results.

Obeikan’s Digital Solutions include case-tailored Digital Solution products and industrial apps for logistics, utility reliability, spare part management, organizational optimization and audit management, with more being developed.

## Journey to Digitalization

## Obeikan Digital Products

A digital logistics platform designed to streamline shipment management, real-time tracking, and delivery reporting for improved efficiency and cost control.

[read more](https://obeikandigital.com.sa/service/madar-digital-fleet-provider-and-transportation-management-platform/)

An industrial marketplace connecting manufacturers and suppliers for seamless procurement of equipment and spare parts.

[read more](https://obeikandigital.com.sa/service/shamel/)

An intelligent maintenance system offering predictive analytics and real-time monitoring to ensure operational efficiency.

[read more](https://obeikandigital.com.sa/service/isaned/)

A comprehensive enterprise management solution integrating HR, finance, and AI-driven insights to enhance business operations.

[read more](https://obeikandigital.com.sa/service/nawras-corporate/)

A powerful educational platform tailored to support school management, enhance teaching outcomes, and optimize student engagement through innovative digital tools.

[read more](https://obeikandigital.com.sa/service/nawras-education/)

## OBEIKAN DIGITAL IN NUMBERS

## Our Partners

## Obeikan DigitalFEATURED NEWS

#### SHAMEL Connect: A Gateway to Innovation Hosted at Obeikan Knowledge Academy

#### Obeikan Digital Solutions and Teradix Forge Strategic Partnership to Transform Procurement and Drive Growth

#### Obeikan Digital Solutions Partners with Significa Ventures to Drive Innovation and Growth

## Stay In TouchSIGN UP FOR OUR NEWS

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS (Software as a Service) industry
evaluations.reasoning: Obeikan Digital Solutions offers cloud‑based, subscription‑based software products.  The O3OZONE platform is listed on the Microsoft Marketplace as a SaaS product (see the Microsoft Marketplace listing for O3OZONE) and the O3OZONE website states it is a "cloud‑based" smart‑manufacturing platform.  MADAR is also listed as a SaaS product on Microsoft Marketplace.  These products are delivered over the internet and accessed via a web browser, meeting the definition of Software as a Service.  Therefore the company operates in the SaaS industry.

What products does Obeikan manufacture?
Obeikan Technical Fabrics is a leading manufacturer of specialty coated fabrics for architectural and signage use. Based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, OTF is a reputable technical textile manufacturers produce and export PVC/PVDF coated polyester and PTFE coated fiber glass fabrics.
